translation: With hands and feet everywhere, with eyes, heads, and mouths everywhere, with ears everywhere, He exists in the worlds, enveloping all.
commentary: 13.14 Everywhere everywhere? panipada with hands and feet? That that? Everywhere everywhere? Axishiromukham with eyes? heads and mouths? Everywhere everywhere? Shrutimat with ears? People in the world? Everything all? cover having enveloped? tishtati exists.Commentary He (the knower of the field or Para Brahman) pervades everything in this world. He fills and surrounds this world with Himself. He abides in the universe
